description: This file defines a global exception handler in a Spring Boot application, providing centralized handling of various exceptions to produce consistent API error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring REST controller advice class that handles various exceptions globally and provides uniform API error responses.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundExceptions and returns a 404 NOT_FOUND response with an ApiError body.

methods.name: handleMethodArgumentNotValid
methods.description: Handles validation failures for request arguments and returns detailed validation error information.

methods.name: handleConstraintViolation
methods.description: Handles constraint violations and returns a validation error response.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, providing a generic internal server error response.
